text: Sergei Borisovich Ivanov (; born 31 January 1953) is a Russian politician who is Special Representative of the President of the Russian Federation on the Issues of Environmental Activities, Environment and Transport since 12 August 2016. He served as a Minister of Defense of Russia from 28 March 2001 to 15 February 2007. == Other websites == * UznayVse Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Russian diplomats Category:Russian generals Category:Politicians from Saint Petersburg
title: Sergey Ivanov
